title: Fear the Spotlight (Epic Games) Giveaway
description: Heads up, horror fans! The Epic Games Store has just launched its next freebie. From October 23 to October 30, 2025, you can add Fear the Spotlight to your library completely free. Fear the Spotlight is a 3D atmospheric third-person adventure with a spooky mystery to unravel.
instructions:
1. Click the button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Login into your Epic Games Store account.
3. Click the button to add the game to your library
